mapper.select: select DbT5224ChikuShichoson."shichosonCode" AS Temp_shichosonCode , DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster."shichosonMeisho" AS Temp_shichosonMeisho from rgdb."DbT5224ChikuShichoson" AS DbT5224ChikuShichoson left join rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster on DbT5224ChikuShichoson."shichosonCode" = DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster."shichosonCode" where DbT5224ChikuShichoson."chosaChikuCode" = #{調査地区コード}
